parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: DomainType
parameters.description:
The type of the domain name that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **root**: root domain name
*   **sub**: subdomain name

parameters.name: FuzzyDomain
parameters.description: The keyword that is used to query domain names. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
